trans-unit.source: Provides data for mouse events raised by a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> whenever the mouse is moved within a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados de eventos de rato gerados por um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> sempre que o rato é movido dentro de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewCellMouseEventArgs class provides data for the following <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> events: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseClick> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseDoubleClick> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseDown> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseMove> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseUp> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeaderMouseClick> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeaderMouseDoubleClick> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeaderMouseClick> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeaderMouseDoubleClick>
trans-unit.target: A classe de DataGridViewCellMouseEventArgs fornece dados para o seguinte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>eventos:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseClick>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseDoubleClick>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseDown>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseMove>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseUp>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeaderMouseClick>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeaderMouseDoubleClick>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeaderMouseClick>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeaderMouseDoubleClick></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeaderMouseDoubleClick> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeaderMouseClick> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeaderMouseDoubleClick> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeaderMouseClick> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseUp> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseMove> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseDoubleClick> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseClick> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellMouseEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellMouseEventArgs"> </xref> classe.
Índice de coluna baseado em zero da célula.
Índice de linha baseado em zero da célula.

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the mouse, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada x do rato, em pixels.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the mouse, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada y do rato em pixéis.

trans-unit.source: Gets the zero-based column index of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o índice baseado em zero de coluna da célula.

trans-unit.source: An integer specifying the column index.
trans-unit.target: Um número inteiro especificando o índice de coluna.

trans-unit.source: Gets the zero-based row index of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o índice baseado em zero de linha da célula.

trans-unit.source: An integer specifying the row index.
trans-unit.target: Um número inteiro especificando o índice de linha.
